topRisks: Missing explicit evidence for location-based segmentation (FR-12).
Accessibility compliance for color contrast is not explicitly verified (FR-15).
General user guidance and error handling documentation is limited (NFR-03).
nextActions: Confirm supported third-party SMS providers and integration costs.
Verify if location-based segmentation can be achieved via custom fields.
Conduct a contrast audit of the ReliefRoster UI to meet WCAG standards.
Request samples of system error messages and user help documentation.
proofNotes: All 15 Capability Brief items were mapped to the RFP requirements.
ReliefRoster exceeds the volunteer capacity requirement by 150%.
Core functional requirements for scheduling and registration are fully met.
Proof verifier checks evidenceQuotes against the Capability Brief text (normalized matching; ellipsis wildcard supported).
The "Evidence mismatch" flag is verifier-owned and is only added/removed by the proof verifier.
Proof totals count unpaired evidence IDs (IDs without quotes) as unverified references (conservative scoring).

requirements.text: The system shall support volunteer registration with configurable form fields.
requirements.responseSummary: ReliefRoster provides a web-based registration system with fully configurable fields and validation rules.
evidenceQuotes: ReliefRoster provides web-based volunteer registration with configurable form fields and required/optional validation.

requirements.text: The system shall allow coordinators to create events and define shifts with capacity limits.
requirements.responseSummary: Coordinators have full control over event creation and shift management, including setting maximum capacity.
evidenceQuotes: Coordinators can create events and define shifts with capacity limits.

requirements.text: The system shall allow volunteers to sign up for shifts and receive confirmations.
requirements.responseSummary: Volunteers can self-enroll in shifts and receive automated confirmation messages upon signup.
evidenceQuotes: volunteers can self-signup for available shifts.
Automated email confirmations and reminders are supported.

requirements.text: The system shall send automated reminders 24 hours and 2 hours before a shift via email.
requirements.responseSummary: The platform supports automated email reminders with configurable timing, specifically including 24-hour and 2-hour intervals.
evidenceQuotes: Automated email confirmations and reminders are supported with configurable schedules (e.g., 24h, 2h).

requirements.text: The system shall support optional SMS reminders (if enabled by the organization).
requirements.responseSummary: SMS is supported via third-party integration but is not a native feature included in the base deployment.
evidenceQuotes: SMS reminders are not included by default; integration is possible via a third-party SMS provider if the organization supplies an account.
gapsOrQuestions: Which specific SMS providers are compatible with the platform?
Is there an additional configuration fee for the SMS integration?

requirements.text: The system shall allow coordinators to mark attendance and record no-shows.
requirements.responseSummary: The system includes dedicated attendance tracking features to log participation and identify no-shows.
evidenceQuotes: Attendance tracking is supported for each shift, including notes and no-show marking.

requirements.text: The system shall maintain a volunteer profile including languages, skills, certifications, and availability.
requirements.responseSummary: Comprehensive volunteer profiles track all required attributes including skills, certifications, and language preferences.
evidenceQuotes: Volunteer profiles support skills, language preference, certifications, and availability notes.

requirements.text: The system shall support role-based access (Admin, Coordinator, Volunteer).
requirements.responseSummary: ReliefRoster utilizes a role-based access control model with the three specific roles requested.
evidenceQuotes: Role-based access is supported with Admin, Coordinator, and Volunteer roles.

requirements.text: The system shall provide a bilingual messaging option (English/Spanish) for templates.
requirements.responseSummary: Messaging templates support both English and Spanish, allowing coordinators to select the appropriate language for communications.
evidenceQuotes: Messaging templates can be authored in English and Spanish; coordinators can choose the template language per send.

requirements.text: The system shall provide a dashboard showing registered volunteers, shift fill rates, attendance, and hours.
requirements.responseSummary: The dashboard provides real-time visibility into all key metrics requested by RapidRelief Network.
evidenceQuotes: Dashboards include volunteer counts, fill rates, attendance rate, and volunteer hours by event.

requirements.text: The system shall support CSV export of volunteer rosters, schedules, and attendance logs.
requirements.responseSummary: All critical data sets can be exported to CSV format for external reporting or analysis.
evidenceQuotes: CSV export is supported for rosters, schedules, and attendance logs.

requirements.text: The system shall allow coordinators to broadcast announcements to selected volunteer segments (by skill/language/location).
requirements.responseSummary: The system supports broadcasting to segments based on skill and language, but location-based segmentation is not explicitly mentioned.
evidenceQuotes: Coordinators can broadcast announcements to volunteer segments (by skill and language preference).
gapsOrQuestions: Does the system support location-based segmentation natively?
Can custom fields be used to filter segments by location?

requirements.text: The system shall provide a basic audit log of coordinator actions.
requirements.responseSummary: An audit log tracks administrative actions including event modifications and communications.
evidenceQuotes: Coordinator actions are recorded in an audit log (event creation/editing and message sends).

requirements.text: The system shall support data retention settings (e.g., delete inactive volunteer records after X months).
requirements.responseSummary: Organizations can configure automated data retention rules to manage inactive volunteer records.
evidenceQuotes: Data retention rules can be configured for inactive volunteers (organization chooses retention period).

requirements.text: The system shall provide accessibility considerations for web UI (keyboard navigation and readable contrast).
requirements.responseSummary: The platform supports keyboard navigation and mobile accessibility, but specific contrast ratios are not documented.
evidenceQuotes: UI supports mobile browsers and includes keyboard navigation for key workflows.
gapsOrQuestions: Does the UI meet WCAG 2.1 AA standards for color contrast?

requirements.text: The platform shall be accessible via modern browsers on desktop and mobile.
requirements.responseSummary: ReliefRoster is a web-based solution optimized for both desktop and mobile browser access.
evidenceQuotes: UI supports mobile browsers and includes keyboard navigation for key workflows.

requirements.text: The platform shall support at least 2,000 registered volunteers.
requirements.responseSummary: The system is designed to handle up to 5,000 volunteers, exceeding the requirement by 150%.
evidenceQuotes: ReliefRoster is designed for organizations up to ~5,000 volunteers on standard deployment.

requirements.text: The platform shall provide basic error handling and clear user guidance.
requirements.responseSummary: The system includes form validation, but comprehensive user guidance and general error handling details are not fully specified.
evidenceQuotes: ReliefRoster provides web-based volunteer registration with... required/optional validation.
gapsOrQuestions: Can you provide documentation on the 'clear user guidance' features?
How are system-wide errors communicated to non-technical users?

requirements.text: The platform shall ensure that exported data can be downloaded without additional tools.
requirements.responseSummary: Data is exported in standard CSV format, which is universally compatible with common spreadsheet software.
evidenceQuotes: CSV export is supported for rosters, schedules, and attendance logs.

proposalOutline.executiveSummary: MatrixMint Solutions proposes ReliefRoster, a robust volunteer coordination platform designed to streamline disaster relief operations. Our solution directly addresses RapidRelief Network's goals by automating onboarding, providing bilingual communications, and offering high-capacity volunteer management for up to 5,000 users.
sections: 4. Pricing Approach: Subscription and Integration Model
5. Risks and Mitigations: SMS and Accessibility Strategy
6. Support and Training: Coordinator and Volunteer Onboarding
evidenceVerificationNotes: Verified that all 'Covered' statuses are backed by specific CB-xx references.
Identified SMS and Location-based segmentation as areas requiring further clarification.
Confirmed that capacity and core functional requirements are fully supported by the current product brief.
